description:
Jerome is a member of the Holy Iron Chain Knights. Originally loyal to the Holy See, he becomes a temporary ally to http://anidb.net/ch650 [Guts] and his party after witnessing the horrors of the Incarnation Ceremony.
Although being a member of the Holy Iron Chain Knights, he was a fairly decent person and in private admitted to disliking his job. He was known to enjoy sex, and spent many of his breaks and much of his money on prostitutes, though he held a special place for http://anidb.net/ch91824 [Luca] in his heart. Though he enjoyed his life`s comfort and was shocked and scared by the happenings at Albion, he resolved to defy the Knights in order to protect Luca.
Source: Berserk Wiki
name: Jerome
